sentences.english: Bedrock beneath hebgen lake warped and rotated, causing a seiche in the lake .
sentences.chinese: 赫布根湖底的基岩發生了翹曲和旋轉，引起湖中浪湧。

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房處在基岩中進行壓水試驗，以確定其透水性。

sentences.english: O groundwater recharges the mine through buried outcrop of bedrock laterally.
sentences.chinese: 奧灰水通過基岩隱伏露頭側向補給礦井。

sentences.english: The term "fluvial incision" refers to vertical incision of stream channel into bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 摘要流水下切是指河流河道在基岩中的垂直切割。

sentences.english: This pedestal rock began as a mass of pebbly sandstone.
sentences.chinese: 這個基岩開始大量的含礫砂岩。

sentences.english: In a case study on the practical engineering, the elastic modulus and Poisson′s ratio are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 結合實際工程，反演了拱壩基岩的彈性模量和泊松比。

sentences.english: Huaxian-Lantian fault is a prequaternary bedrock fault.
sentences.chinese: 華縣一蘭田斷裂爲第四紀前基岩斷裂。

sentences.english: Foundation rocks are required to have the enough strength to bear the load of dam body.
sentences.chinese: 基岩要求具有足夠的強度承受壩壩身的荷載。

sentences.english: The rock mass of dam foundation of Zaoshi Hydroproject is mainly fine silicarenite with soft layers.
sentences.chinese: 皁市水利樞紐壩基岩體主要爲石英細砂岩夾軟弱夾層。

sentences.english: The term "fluvial incision" refers to vertical incision of stream channel into bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 流水下切是指河流河道在基岩中的垂直切割。

sentences.english: It is found that Ceramium spp and Gracilaria verrucosa become the chief dominant species in the red algal community during May.
sentences.chinese: 煙臺海域基岩潮間帶紅藻羣落的優勢種爲仙菜和江籬。

sentences.english: The bedrock slide is an important apptarance of the seismicity in Huoshan region.
sentences.chinese: 霍山地區基岩滑坡與該區地震活動有重要聯繫。

sentences.english: One of a series of short scars made by glacial DRIFT on a surface of bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 冰川漂流物在基岩表面留下的一系列短痕之一。

sentences.english: The reviviscence of accumulation landslide along bedrock surface is a common geological hazard.
sentences.chinese: 堆積層滑坡沿基岩面再次滑動是一種常見的地質災害。

sentences.english: It emphases introduces the way and the effect of drilling and blasting construction at the bedrock section of main shaft.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹了井筒基岩段鑽眼爆破施工方法及效果。

sentences.english: The west edge of the basin overlapped on bedrock, there is not any substantive relation with the Altyn Tagh fault.
sentences.chinese: 盆地的西部邊緣超覆在基岩之上，不受斷裂控制。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
